about_the_game:
Get ready for the ultimate off-road trucking adventure in Truck Driving Cargo Simulator! Take the wheel of powerful trucks and deliver a variety of cargo through challenging terrains. With dynamic environments and realistic physics, this game will test your driving skills like never before.

Features:

  • Diverse Cargo Types: Deliver wood, containers, cars, oil tankers, milk tankers, stones, gasoline, water tankers, and more.

  •  Challenging Terrains: Navigate through off road tracks with snow, rain, sunny days, and scenic night drives where players take on the role of a truck driver. drive carefully on dangerous off-road hilly turns and have fun with free-form driving in Truck Driving Cargo Simulator. you have to face sleepy roads challenges due to heavy snow on roads, in this gameplay you require a lot of skills on mountain roads and rainy paths.

  • Dynamic Levels: Experience unique obstacles and trails that require precision and strategy. Complete all levels one by one by attach trailers with truck and start driving to deliver cargo to their destinations and go to next assigned mission.

  • Realistic Physics: Feel the weight of your cargo and master the art of balancing speed and control. Players can experience realistic truck physics, engine sounds, steering, and braking, with various cargo attachments.

  • Immersive Environments: Stunning visuals with changing weather conditions and beautiful landscapes.

Conquer the toughest roads, complete your deliveries, and prove yourself as the ultimate cargo truck driver. Are you up for the challenge?

  • Dynamic Levels: Experience unique obstacles and trails that require precision and strategy. Complete all levels one by one by attach trailers with truck and start driving to deliver cargo to their destinations and go to next assigned mission.

  • Realistic Physics: Feel the weight of your cargo and master the art of balancing speed and control. Players can experience realistic truck physics, engine sounds, steering, and braking, with various cargo attachments.

name: Truck Driving Cargo Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 610
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Improve your driving skills and prove yourself as a skilled truck driver by delivering heavy trucks with cargo attachments from origin to their destination places in this Truck Driving Cargo Simulator. The games include dynamic weather conditions such as rain, snow, fog and changing day/night cycles
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
